metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The proposed methodology combines graph neural networks with molecular fingerprints to predict drug-target interactions. The approach demonstrates superior performance compared to traditional methods.
The dataset contains 10,000 drug-target pairs with validated binding affinities. All compounds were filtered for drug-likeness using Lipinski's rule of five.
Performance evaluation shows 85% accuracy on the test set with AUC-ROC of 0.92. The model outperforms baseline methods by 12% in terms of precision.
